title: Queen's Christmas message expected to be personal

description: People travelling to the UK once again need to take tests before they start their journey.

description: Three months on from her US Open triumph, those close to Emma Raducanu recall her 'Fairytale in New York' in a BBC Radio 5 Live documentary to be aired on Thursday.
